about_the_game:
Experience the tranquil ambiance of gazing out the window.
This trial offers a glimpse into part of the theme "The Last Leaf".
Through the dweller's eyes, catch fleeting vignettes of the lives unfolding beyond the glass. The interior decor, perhaps, may unveil personal insights about this enigmatic soul.

*Please note the demo only contains a small sampling of the full narrative progression.
